title: The Artisan's Sanctuary Manual
subtitle: Chapter I: The Art of Moss & Stone

philosophy.title: The Way of the Forest
philosophy.p1: In the quiet of the morning, there is only the Washi—a pristine, untouched white void. Then came the Brush, guided by your breath, bringing the first drop of evergreen to the surface.
philosophy.p2: Rupa is your rural sanctuary. Here, pixels aren't just data—they are Leaves. Every mark you make is a deliberate act of tending a garden that requires patience, focus, and a peaceful heart.
philosophy.p3: "We do not just paint pixels; we weave stories into the moss of time."

cursor.title: The Artisan's Brush
cursor.desc: Your voice in the sanctuary. Move it with the Arrow Keys to guide your patterns with the precision of a master gardener.

colors.title: The Natural Pigments
colors.desc: Rich extracts from forest flora. Apply them with Space and switch pigments using the numbers on your keyboard.

layers.title: The Washi Sheets
layers.desc: Layers of depth. Like stacking fine washi paper, each sheet adds a new dimension to your story.

continuous.title: Fluid Moss-Painting
continuous.desc: Hold Ctrl while moving to stream pigment across the washi.

magic_select.title: Spirit Gathering
magic_select.desc: Press W to select all connected leaves of the same tone. A mystical way to rearrange your garden.

timeline.title: The Seasons' Flow
timeline.desc: Create sequences of servings to breathe life into your work. Press P to feel the pulse of nature.

audio.title: Resonant Sanctuary
audio.desc: Listen. The sanctuary responds to your focus with piano melodies and distant wind chimes.

footer.quote: May your brush be steady and your sanctuary ever-peaceful.
